title: First Tour
Short Description: My favorite gems in downtown Chicago.

locations.title: The Merchandise Mart
locations.short: Chicago’s Merchandise Mart was the first ever building with its own zip code. It holds wondrous secrets, like a magnificent tassel store and the most well numbered staircase in the world.
